text: This guy built 13 OpenClaw agents - plugged them to everything: email, bank statement, home assistant, printer, phone.
Failure breeds success, every failure is progress forward.
Did you try viewing them in openclaw studio?
Cline CLI supply chain attack - malicious version silently installed OpenClaw via postinstall script. Caught and fixed within hours.
Using Hostinger VPS for OpenClaw: 2 CPU cores, 8GB RAM, 100GB disk. Feels slow and slacky.
OpenClaw seems to be driving Mac mini popularity. Planning to upgrade from M4 to M5 Mac mini.
Growth strategy: posting about OpenClaw/video generation/AI economics to build authority in AI builder space.
